# cylcop

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of cylcop is to provide methods to apply circular-linear
copulas to capture correlation in discrete time movement data, i.e. step lengths and turn angles.

## Installation

You can install the released version of cylcop from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

``` r
install.packages("cylcop")
```

And the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("floo66/cylcop")
```
## Introduction and Further Explanations

A thorough introduction to the package and its features can be found in [@Hodelappl] and [@Hodelmethod]
